guide.step1-content1: The answer should be submitted in
guide.step2-Windows2: [ Time & Language ] → [ Language & region ] → [ Preferred languages ] → [ Add a language ]
guide.step2-Windows3: Search for Japanese, and install it.
guide.step2-Windows4: Press Windows + Space to switch to Japanese.
guide.step2-MacOS2: [ Keyboard ] → [ Text Input ] → [ Input Sources ] → [ Edit ] → [ + ]
guide.step2-MacOS3: Search for Japanese, and add it.
guide.step2-MacOS4: Press Control + Space to switch to Japanese.
guide.step2-Linux2: [ Region & Language ] → [ System ] → [ Manage Installed Languages ] → [ Install / Remove Languages ]
guide.step2-Linux3: Select Japanese, and click apply button.
guide.step2-Linux4: [ Keyboard ] → [ Add Input Source ] → [ Japanese ] → [ Add Japanese(Mozc) ]
guide.step2-Linux5: Press Super + Space to switch to Japanese.
guide.step2-iOS2: [ General ] → [ Keyboard ] → [ Keyboard ] → [ Add New Keyboard ]
guide.step2-iOS3: Search for Japanese, and add it.
guide.step2-iOS4: Switch keyboards by tapping the globe icon while typing.
guide.step2-Android2: [ General ] → [ Languages & input ] → [ Language ] → [ Add Language ]
guide.step2-Android3: Search for Japanese, and add it.
guide.step2-Android4: Switch keyboards by tapping the globe icon while typing.
guide.step3-content1: Press ENTER or SUBMIT BUTTON to submit the answer.
guide.step3-content2: If it’s correct, you will proceed to the next question. Otherwise, you can enter the answer again.
guide.step4-content1: If you don’t know the answer, you can press the SKIP BUTTON to move to the next question.
guide.step5-content1: Shows the current round and the total rounds.
guide.step6-content1: Listen with TTS or check how to read it in the Dictionary.
guide.step7-content2: The current quiz progress will not be saved.
guide.step8-content1: Navigate immediately to Quiz result page.
guide.step8-content2: You can click without completing all rounds.

game.finish-modal-content: Navigate to the Quiz result page.
